meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tina Nguyen Carlos Ross Scott Claremon Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6722.

div.div: Alex announces Andy Westney (1980s), Shane Whitlock (1990s), and Tom Nissley (2000s) as the winners of the Battle of the Decades Fan Favorite online polls.

td.p: Tina Nguyen, a food media writer from New York, New York
Carlos Ross, a customer service representative from Austin, Texas
Scott Claremon, a tax attorney from Sacramento, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,899)

tr.td: LITERARY TITLE COLORS
ALSO A BOWLING TERM
HOLY DAYS & OBSERVANCES
HOOK
LINE
STINKER

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
